author: Alex Zaragoza, Leslie Horn
title: The Only Theater Screening New Movies Is a Drive-In in Ocala, Florida
description: The owner of the Ocala Drive-In told VICE why people still need a place to see 'Trolls World Tour.'
content: Movie theaters across the country have shut down as the coronavirus crisis has led the government to enforce stay-at-home orders and evening curfews in some cities. The film industry has been hit hard as a result, with studios either pushing back the release … [+4791 chars]
